bibl.title: A Late Greek Tragedy on the Theft of the Palladion: P. Colon. Inv. Nr. 5932.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Michigan. Summary in DA 45 (1984-1985) p. 2089-A. - Upper Egypt, third century A.D. The papyrus may be the only autograph of a dramatic manuscript preserved, or at least published, from antiquity [= P. Köln VI, 245].
Parca Maryline Gisèle, A Late Greek Tragedy on the Theft of the Palladion: P. Colon. Inv. Nr. 5932.
